entry.def: If someone has the backing of an organization or an important person, they receive support or money from that organization or person in order to do something.

example.ex: He said the president had the full backing of his government to negotiate a deal...
example.tran: 他说政府将全力支持总统通过谈判达成协议。

example.ex: Mr Bach set up his own consulting business with the backing of his old boss.
example.tran: 在以前老板的帮助下，巴赫先生成立了自己的咨询公司。

entry.def: A backing is a layer of something such as cloth that is put onto the back of something in order to strengthen or protect it.
The backing of a popular song is the music which is sung or played to accompany the main tune.

example.ex: Sharon also sang backing vocals for Barry Manilow...
example.tran: 莎伦也为巴里·马尼洛伴唱。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of providing approval and support;

sentences.sentence: "his vigorous backing of the conservatives got him in trouble with progressives"

means.word_mean: 2. something forming a back that is added for strengthening
3. financial resources provided to make some project possible;

sentences.sentence: "the foundation provided support for the experiment"

Sentence.sentence: Government bonds are a secure investment because these bonds have the financial backing and full faith and credit of the federal government.
She might not know about the pages backing up that need attention, or about the designer who had to go home sick.

sentences.en: They want backing for more research.
sentences.cn: 他们需要支持来做更多的研究。

sentences.en: Who’s going to provide the backing?
The backing will come from the government.
The teachers have the full backing of the school governors.
sentences.cn: 老师们获得校董的全力支持。

sentences.en: They brought the legal action with the backing of their MP.
sentences.cn: 在他们的下议院议员的支持下他们提起了法律诉讼。

sentences.en: BBC backing for the scheme will enhance its credibility.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司对这一计划的支持将提高其可信度。

sentences.en: If we can’t get any financial backing,we might as well forget the whole thing.
sentences.cn: 我们如果得不到财政支持,整件事就可能告吹。

sentences.en: They have won financial backing from the EU.
sentences.cn: 他们获得了欧盟的经济支持。

sentences.en: Our plan has plenty of backing.
sentences.cn: 我们的计划拥有大量的支持者。

sentences.en: Mirrors have a backing of quicksilver.
She had toured as a backing musician for a rock star.
sentences.cn: 她曾以某摇滚歌星伴奏乐师的身分巡回演出。
